items.name: Linear Algebra
items.desc: Blue1Brown's playlist on YouTube is the most engaging Linear Algebra playlist.

items.name: Multivariable Calculus
items.desc: Khan Academy's Multivariable Calculus lessons are an amazing refresher.

items.name: Statistics and Probability
items.desc: Please watch the Youtube playlist by the channel StatsQuest. Unique style and awesome content.

items.name: Stanford Intro to Machine Learning by Andrew Ng
items.desc: The course also offers a free set of course notes, which are very well written.

items.name: Caltech Machine Learning
items.desc: These are less mathematical and more intuition based.

items.name: Vizuara AI's Machine Learning Teach by Doing
Andrej Karpathy's Zero to Hero Series
items.desc: Andrej Karpathy, an AI researcher who graduated with a Stanford PhD and led Tesla AI for several years, released an amazing series of hands on lectures on YouTube.

items.name: Vizuara AI Neural networks from scratch series
University of Waterloo lectures
items.desc: This will give you lots of insights into how Transformers work.

items.name: Vizuara AI Building Transformers series
items.desc: One of the best resources to understand transformers from scratch.

items.name: ChatGPT Explainer
items.desc: Wolfram's YouTube explainer video on ChatGPT is one of the best videos to watch.

items.name: Interactive LLM Visualization
items.desc: This LLM visualization that you can play with in your browser is hands down the best interactive experience with an LLM.
